EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email alert template invitation to the Survey: Test Client Survey
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Workflow User] Test Client Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: Test Client Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(User.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'http://aecom.force.com/surveys/timbasurveys__survey?id=a13a0000007xm7tAAA&uId=' + User.Id + '&case_id=' + Case.Id + '&wf=yes','http://aecom.force.com/surveys/timbasurveys__survey?id=a13a0000007xm7tAAA&uId=' + User.Id + '&wf=yes'),'')}
